Title: Relates to prevailing wages for certain employees of not-for-profit theaters
Summary: Relates to prevailing wages for certain employees of not-for-profit theaters by defining prevailing wage rates and requiring compliance and reporting regarding such wage rates.
LawCode: Add Art 9-A §§239-b - 239-k, Lab L; amd §§3.01 & 3.19, Arts & Cul L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the labor law and the arts and cultural affairs law, in relation to prevailing wages for certain employees of not-for-profit theaters
